content:
No worries about not mentioning the cookbook name - I was just curious!

I'm glad to hear that the containers are working out well for you! Having good containers can make a big difference in meal prep, and it's great that you're finding them durable and convenient. Walmart has a great selection of containers, and it's awesome that you found some that fit your needs.

Now, let's get back to meal prep planning! Are you thinking of trying out any new recipes from your cookbook, or do you have some favorites in mind? I'm here to help with any questions or suggestions!
